descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]Armor type :[/size][/b] heavy armor
[b][size=3]Body :[/size][/b] UNPB-TBBP
[b][size=3]Weight slider :[/size][/b] Not support(always 1.0)
[b][size=3]Parts :[/size][/b][list=1] [*]cape
[*]cuirass
[*]gloves
[*]panty
[*]another panty
[*]skirt
[*]thigh guard
[*]boots(high heel).
[/list] Total armor rate and weight are same as a orcish armor.
[b][size=3]Recipe :[/size][/b][list] [*]cape -> prisoner tunic x1
[*]cuirass -> iron ingot x1, leather strips x5, leather x4
[*]gloves -> leather strips x2, leather x2
[*]panty -> Ragged Trousers x1
[*]another panty -> leather x1, leather strips x2
[*]skirt -> prisoner tunic x1
[*]thigh guard -> iron ingot x1, leather strips x4, leather x2
[*]boots -> iron ingot x1, leather strips x4, leather x2
[/list]You will not find the recipe if you do not have one or more the leather or prisoner tunic.

[b][size=3]Required :[/size][/b] XPMS or XPMSE
SKSE v1.7.3(Because for adjust high-heels height)
If you use SKSE plugin, need Microsoft Visual C++ 2012 Redistributable(x86).
If you don't need SKSE plugin, remove it. It is possible also to remove after the installation.

[size=3][b]Cresit[/b][/size]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] by Blessed Redux Project team
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender(SKSE)[/url] by SKSE team
author: gekkou1992

files.name: .psd files
files.changelogHtml:
Added smithing recipe
Fixed ground model
Fixed thigh material

files.name: .psd file
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed boots texture(upper belt hole texture : leather -> metal)
Fixed SKSE plugin code. Added ini file. You can tweak high heel height. SKSE plugin re-load it when save-game data was loaded. It does not work when start new game maybe(working default value).

files.name: .psd file
files.changelogHtml:
Added a panty
Tweaked cape weight paint
SKSE plugin bug(It dose not work after the 2nd time load game if keep playing game without closing Skyrim)
Changed the method of calculating the high heels height. Because if set to match a tall(short) character, short(tall) character seems to float(sink). If you have edited ini, please re-edit ini. If you had edited height : New Height = "current Height" / 10.

files.name: .psd file
files.changelogHtml: Reworked new panty because I became not like it

files.name: .psd file
files.changelogHtml:
Changed bra transmission setting. It will not be hidden in the water. But it is bit a flick(moire fringe?).
Fixed bra weight paint

files.name: Leather Armor for UNPB-TBBP
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed thigh guard UV
Adjusted thigh guard weight paint
Fixed new panty weght paint
